testcase.system-out: * def result = callonce read('../../claroApp/authentication/signin.feature@login') . passed * header Content-Type = 'application/json' ................................ passed * header userInfo = java.net.URLEncoder.encode(result.userInfo, 'UTF-8') .. passed * header x-application-key = xappkey ...................................... passed * header gw-app-key = gwappkey ............................................ passed * header Cache-Control = 'no-cache' ....................................... passed * url userUrl ............................................................. passed * def responseApi = ....................................................... passed Given path 'contract' ..................................................... passed And request {} ............................................................ passed When method get ........................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed And match response == responseApi ......................................... passed And def contractnumber = response.contracts[0].contractNumber ............. passed And def operatorcode = response.contracts[0].operatorCode ................. passed And def userinfo = result.userInfo ........................................ passed
